summary: Chairman Emeritus of The Care Fund www.thecarefund.org  after having sold real estate and managed a major real estate company over several decades.  Private Advocate for Real Estate, title, and Mortgage Banking. I see myself as a real estate resource for transactions, problems, and opportunities.  Additionally, I have expereince in mediation and arbitration of disputes.  My objectiove is to help build the success of salespeople and businesses in the Home Ownership Industry.Specialties: Motivation and Culture building - Empowerment and Sales development
